statements: SELECT * FROM payment_information WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, payment_amount FROM payment_information WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, card_number, payment_amount FROM payment_information WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM payment_information WHERE payment_date >= '2023-01-01' AND payment_date < '2024-01-01' ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, billing_address FROM payment_information WHERE cvv IS NOT NULL AND billing_address LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM payment_information WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, payment_amount FROM payment_information WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT payment_method FROM payment_information ORDER BY payment_method DESC;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM payment_information WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_information WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' AND cvv = '123' AND billing_address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date, payment_method FROM payments;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT amount, payment_method FROM payments WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT payment_id, payment_method FROM payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date, payment_method FROM payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date, payment_method FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date, payment_method FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_total, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_total BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT users.username, payments.payment_amount FROM users JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.user_id;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT users.username, orders.order_total FROM users JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id WHERE orders.order_total < 500;
SELECT * FROM payments LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_method FROM payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT p.payment_date, t.status, pm.method_name FROM payments p JOIN transactions t ON p.payment_id = t.payment_id JOIN payment_methods pm ON p.payment_method = pm.method_id;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT users.first_name, users.last_name, payments.amount, transactions.status FROM users JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.user_id JOIN transactions ON transactions.payment_id = payments.payment_id WHERE transactions.status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM payment_methods WHERE method_name LIKE '%credit%';

SELECT users.first_name, users.last_name, transactions.status, payment_methods.method_name FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id JOIN payment_methods ON payment_methods.method_id = transactions.payment_id WHERE transactions.status = 'failed' ORDER BY transactions.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Payment_Info;
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, expiration_date FROM Payment_Info WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, city, state FROM Billing_Address WHERE zip_code = '12345';
SELECT * FROM Transaction_Log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM User_Profile WHERE phone_number = '555-123-4567';
SELECT * FROM Payment_Info WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, card_number FROM Payment_Info WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM Transaction_Log WHERE payment_status = 'Success' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) as total_orders FROM Order_Details GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_orders > 3;

SELECT u.username, p.street_address, o.total_amount FROM User_Profile u INNER JOIN Billing_Address p ON u.user_id = p.user_id INNER JOIN Order_Details o ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE o.total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY o.total_amount DESC;
